meanings: [동사] separate, break up, split (up), part company (with)

vlive.korean: 나오코와 결별했어요. I broke up with Naoko. 듣기 View video EXO : 카이브이앱
결별을 택했다. they finanly broke up. 듣기 View video 10PM : 월요일 하지영의 한밤의 연예뉴스 with 다이아 A night's entertainment news with DIA
그런 사람이랑 결별한 이후에... After splitting up... 듣기 View video 10PM : 월요일 하지영의 한밤의 연예뉴스 with 매드타운 A night's entertainment news with MADTOWN
결별이요? - 결혼인가요? 뭐죠? Split up? - What did it mean? 듣기 View video 10PM : 월요일 하지영의 한밤의 연예뉴스 with 매드타운 A night's entertainment news with MADTOWN
vlive.english: Split up? - What did it mean?

vlive.korean: 사실 결별 얘기는 여러번 나왔어요. There were a lot of rumors about their break up. 듣기 View video 10PM : [10pm2 월] 하지영의 한밤의 연예뉴스 A night's entertainment news
vlive.english: There were a lot of rumors about their break up.

examples.korean: The band have parted company with their manager. 발음듣기 그 밴드는 자기들 매니저와 헤어졌다[결별했다]. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The band have parted company with their manager. 발음

examples.korean: The band and their manager have parted company. 발음듣기 그 밴드와 그들의 매니저는 헤어졌다[결별했다]. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The band and their manager have parted company. 발음

examples.korean: They split up after ten years together. 발음듣기 그들은 10년을 함께 지낸 후에 결별했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They split up after ten years together. 발음

examples.korean: This decision represents a significant departure from previous policy. 발음듣기 이번 결정은 이전 정책과의 의미심장한 결별에 해당한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This decision represents a significant departure from previous policy. 발음

examples.korean: She intends to split from the band at the end of the tour. 발음듣기 그녀는 이번 순회공연이 끝나면 밴드와 결별하려고 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She intends to split from the band at the end of the tour. 발음
